title: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Cake in a dream for a single woman. Cake is a type of dessert that is often used on birthdays or wedding occasions and symbolizes joy and happiness. People differ in the way they make it. Some of them add chocolate to it, others include white cream, and many flavors can be presented according to taste and desire. A confectionery maker, and when he sees a cake girl in a dream, he wonders about the meaning of the dream and begins searching for its meaning, so we will explain the different interpretations of this dream in the following lines. Cake dreams for individuals. Jurists give many interpretations to interpret a dream about cake for a single woman, the most important of which are the following: If she sees A girl has a cake in her dream, it means that she will soon celebrate or attend an engagement or wedding to someone from her heart, and in most cases she will communicate with a good person who will change her life for the better. If an unmarried woman finds it difficult to eat cake during sleep, she will live with problems, resentment and anguish, and this may be related to a problem with a person with whom she has an emotional relationship. If a girl sees in her dream that she is preparing a cake, then she should be happy and it predicts abundant money and goodness to come. And the new life that she will live and the dreams that she will achieve. A person who dreams of seeing a cake symbolizes sweet sharing and achieving goals and objectives. A girl who sees a cake covered with cream in a dream indicates her close marriage to a person with high morals and religion, and since a cream cake in a dream means love and good news This is good news that her husband will love her for her and do everything in his power just to make her happy and comfortable. Enter the dream interpretation website on the Internet from Google and you will find all the interpretations you are looking for. Cake in a dream by Ibn Sirino. One of the most prominent interpretations received from Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin regarding cake in a dream. The unmarried woman says the following: Ibn Sirin explained that the meaning of cake in a girl’s dream varies depending on her condition, but in general it indicates kindness, contentment, and happy events in the coming period. If an unmarried woman sees a white cake in her dream, this indicates the end of feelings of distress and sadness. If a girl sees a pink cake in a dream, this indicates a happy life, prosperity and luxury. Seeing a white cream cake in a dream symbolizes losing sadness and finding solutions to all the difficulties she faces in her life. Eating cake in a dream for a single woman Eating a sweet cake in a dream means being surprised by things Happy and fulfilling the desires that the dreamer has always dreamed of. Eating cake for a single woman in a dream, regardless of its type, symbolizes the achievement of what she desires due to her continuous effort and clear goals, and many interpreters believe that the dream also indicates her relationship with a man who has influence and power. If a girl dreams that she is suffering while eating cake, this will lead to her injury. She became depressed as a result of the separation between her and her lover, but God gives her good news of compensation soon. If the person from whom she took the cake to eat is familiar to her, then this is the

title: Learn about the interpretation of sleeping in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and the interpretation of a dream about sleeping in bed.

preview.html: Sleeping in one's fingers has many connotations and symbols that may indicate goodness, and some of them indicate unhappy events. As we know that sleep is the time when a person resorts to rest and calm and getting enough sleep, which makes him active and energetic. Sleeping in a dream The interpretation of a dream about sleep is evidence of the deception that the dreamer is falling into around him. As for the one who feels tired and exhausted and sees in a dream that he is sleeping and does not He wakes up with difficulty, as this indicates mental tranquility. Sleeping in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. When someone dreams that he is sleeping on his back, this indicates the good luck he enjoys. However, if the dreamer sees that he is sleeping on his back and a piece of bread comes out of his mouth, this means that he is a person who cannot manage his life. Seeing the sick person in a dream sleeping in the cemetery indicates the approach of his death and seeing deep sleep also indicates negligence in which the dreamer does not perform the duties of his religion, This is what puts him in a constant state of depression and lack of rest. Sleeping in Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream If a person dreams of his weight, he sleeps in a dark blue color, then it is one of the visions that indicate the presence of relatives of the dreamer in the graves who fall short of guidance and abandon the path of error. To know Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of other dreams, go to Google and type dream interpretation website... You will find everything you are looking for. Sleeping in a single dreamWhen an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is sleeping, this is an indication of her ability to take responsibility, know what she wants and try to achieve it by making some effort. A girl who is going through distress and distress, If she sees in a dream that she is sleeping deeply and does not want to wake up, this indicates that she will continue to pray to get out of distress, and indeed she will enjoy comfort in the near future and God Almighty will bring her out of her bad condition. As for a girl who dreams that she is sleeping in her bed, she will enjoy comfort and tranquility, and that she will She receives praise for the blessings she has obtained within herself. Sleeping in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman hears the sound of her sleep groaning in a dream, this indicates the deception to which she is exposed by her relatives, as they take advantage of her. As for a married woman who sees in her dream that she is sleeping standing up. This indicates her inability to raise her children, as they are not good in herself. If a married woman sees her husband sleeping in a dream and tries to wake him up, this indicates that she is encouraging him, and that she will not abandon him in his trial. Sleep in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she She is sleeping next to her husband and is happy with that, as this indicates her satisfaction with her life and her stability in married life. It ends with separation. As for the pregnant woman who sees herself sleeping on her back, this indicates her intense love for her family and tries to make them happy in any way, and seeing a pregnant woman sleeping on her back is evidence of her neglect. Family and husband. Sleeping in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is sleeping at noon, it is one of the visions that indicate many supplications and brings her closer to God (to the Most High). If a divorced woman sees that she is asleep at noon, then it is one of the visions that indicate many supplications and brings her closer to God (to the Most High).

title: Seeing someone else falling in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing another person falling in a dream about a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is falling. This may indicate some changes that may occur in her life, such as marriage or engagement, God willing. Some dream interpreters have indicated that when a girl sees that she is falling in a dream. This It indicates her need to escape from the problems she faces in her life. If a girl falls in a dream and is not harmed, this indicates her success in her life after betrayal, and God knows best. If a girl falls and suffers some harm, this indicates that she will not achieve the goals she seeks, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone falling in a dream or falling in it and its meaning Interpretation of seeing another person falling in a dream about a married woman When a married woman sees that she is falling in a dream and has some wounds. This indicates that she will be affected by something bad, or someone close to her, and God knows best. If she sees A married woman has one of her family members fall and was not harmed. This is evidence of overcoming adversity and achieving what God Almighty requires. If a married woman sees one of her children falling from a height, this indicates her constant feeling of anxiety and fear for the future of her children, and God knows best. When a married woman sees that one Her children fell from a height and died, so this indicates her long life, and God knows best. Ibn Shaheen says in his interpretation of visions that if a married woman sees that she has fallen from a high place, this indicates the approaching time of her birth, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing another person falling in a dream about a man and its meaning when he saw A man falls from a high place and is not injured. This indicates that he will overcome those things that make him frustrated and change his life for the better. If one sees that he fell but has some wounds. This may indicate the loss that he will experience in his life and work, and God knows best. If one sees In his dream, a child falls from a height and he was able to save him. This indicates overcoming the problems and judgments that block his way, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream that another person falls from a height. The meaning of seeing another person falling in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If the pregnant woman sees that she has fallen and he does not catch her Any harm. This indicates that her pregnancy will end well, and she will give birth safely without harm, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she has fallen, but she has some wounds and fractures. This indicates that there is a problem at birth, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman falling in The dream means that she will give birth to a boy, God willing. Interpretation of seeing another person falling in a dream for young men and its meaning When a young man saw that he fell in a dream from above and was not harmed. This indicates the emergence of some disputes and problems between him and one of his partners, but he will act wisely. When a young man dreams of falling, this It indicates the death of sadness and worry and the facilitation of goodness in his life, and God knows best. When a young man sees that he has fallen from a height, this may indicate a feeling of remorse for the things he does. But he will stop doing that soon, God willing. You may be interested: Interpretation of dreams about falling from A high place and waking up. Interpretation of seeing another person falling in a dream for a divorced woman. When a divorced woman falls in a dream, this indicates...

title: Interpretation of a dream about an airport in a dream

preview.html: People are looking for an interpretation of seeing an airport in a dream. In detail, an airport is a place through which a person can travel outside the country. You may also be able to recognize entering the house of the dead in a dream. It is also the only place to accept travelers from other countries and is the only place where planes can take off. In it from outside the country and even landing from different flights, so it is often evidence of a change in the viewer’s life, and this is what we will do in this article. Interpretation of seeing a girl waiting for someone at the airport and she was in the dream at the specified time. This vision may indicate her desire intense and waiting for the fulfillment of her dreams and goals. If a person returns on time, this is good news that these desires will be fulfilled soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the same girl watching the airport in a dream: This vision can indicate a change and improvement of this girl’s situation for the better in every aspect, whether it is This is academic, social, or scientific. Interpretation of seeing a girl waiting for someone at the airport and being late in a dream. This vision may indicate a delay in her desired desires and ambitions, but the good thing about this vision is that in the end her desires come true, and God knows best. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of the airport vision In a dream Read also: Penguin in a dream In the event that an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream observing the airport in front of her or it is actually there, this dream is evidence that her circumstances have changed for the better in all ways, practically, socially, or even academically. In the case of a single woman who saw herself in a dream, waiting for someone to return from a trip, this dream was evidence of her desire to wait to fulfill some ambitions and dreams. In the event that an unmarried girl saw this dream while she was waiting for someone to return from a trip, but usually it is That unusually late, the vision was evidence of the delay of the desire or ambitions that you dreamed of, but in the end God will allow it. Which must be fulfilled. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream packing her travel belongings and then heading to the airport, the dream is evidence of the presence of a series of privacy and secrets in this girl’s life that she does not want. Do not tell anyone about them. An unmarried woman who sees herself in a dream going to the airport and the person who comes to her and can bring her back indicates marriage, God willing. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a donkey in a dream. Meaning of a dream about an airport for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is going to the airport To leave the country, the dream suggests that this woman’s situation will change for the better, because travel is often a sign of goodness and benefit in all aspects of life. In the interpretation of seeing an airport in a dream for a married woman, if she sees herself waiting for someone inside the airport, the dream indicates that she is waiting for fulfillment. Wishing or waiting to have children. Either way, the vision is praiseworthy. This dream of a married woman may be a sign of a change in her husband’s circumstances.

title: Interpretation of children playing in a dream: Seeing the game in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of children’s toys in a dream Seeing toys in a dream, the concept of a child is represented by various signs, as it describes a time stage in a person’s life and this stage is characterized by certain characteristics represented by the first age stage. Of human life after birth, as God Almighty said: (Then We will bestow upon you a child), so the child at this stage depends on the environment surrounding him like the parents, and here we provide the interpretation of a child playing in a dream. And seeing the play in a dream, Ibn Sirin’s dream of children’s toys, where Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing children playing in a dream indicates falsehood and immorality, and it also indicates that the monarch is wasting his time on worthless matters and may abandon the act of obedience, especially when he sees dice and playing chess, and seeing games It indicates competition, hostility, and differences that are accumulating in the dreamer’s life during the coming period of his life, and God knows best. A dream about children’s toys from Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi said: Seeing toys in a dream indicates the priest’s recklessness and mockery of things that may be important in his life, as they cannot be paid for, and it may be a sign of lack. Priest to morality and religion. Just as watching games indicates a state of loss experienced by the viewer. A dream of children playing for single people: A dream of children playing with an unmarried woman is a praiseworthy thing, as it portends joy and happiness, and also indicates love, appreciation and respect for those around her, in addition to being a sign of good companionship and friendship. . Seeing them playing in the form of dogs is an abomination, and shows many obstacles and challenges, and playing in the form of predatory animals shows determination, strong will, and toughness in order to face any obstacles in their lives. Playing in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a married woman playing in a dream shows her ability to satisfy her desires and confront all The obstacles and challenges she faces, and a married woman playing with children in her sleep shows her desire to become pregnant and have children, but she is married. A woman playing with her husband symbolizes the collapse of disputes and problems, and a married woman’s game symbolizes the path of neglecting her responsibility. That is, electronic games in a dream indicate that the dreamer is an adventurous person and takes risks and consequences to achieve his goals, as the dreams that the person has are different, as the dreamer wants to interpret them. He is very curious. This dream.

title: Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing new shoes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing wearing new shoes in a dream. It is known that all the daily things that a person does are stored in the subconscious. In order to deal with people's sleep, where a person sees many visions, including seeing shoes, and in this article we will explain the interpretation of the vision of wearing new shoes in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of wearing shoes by Ibn SirinSeeing shoes in a dream is definitely one of the dreams that the dreamer can see A lot, and the reason for this is that shoes are used extensively in daily life, and in this regard we will explain Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing shoes: In general, Ibn Sirin believes that seeing shoes in a dream is a sign of sustenance and allowances. In addition to achieving the desired goals. While Ibn Sirin claims If a woman sees in her dream that she is buying new shoes. This is definitely a sign of a new person entering her life. And if a woman sees in a dream that she is wearing high-heeled shoes. This inevitably means that he is associated with a person who has a high status. In general, seeing wearing shoes in a dream indicates the presence of a woman. To meet a new person, in addition to that, will enter her life. Whereas if the shoes in the dream are black, the woman’s relationship with the specific person will remain within limits Its work. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing shoes in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing new shoes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing new shoes for single women. It is worth noting that what girls love most about their appearance is being able to choose shoes, and therefore it is natural for a girl to dream of shoes in her dream, and it is The interpretation of the dream is as follows: If the girl in her dream wears tight shoes, this may indicate stubbornness. There is no doubt that if the shoes in the dream are beautiful and with high heels, this indicates her connection to her life. While the shoes that the unmarried girl saw were golden, this It definitely indicates her engagement and marriage. If a single woman sees in her dream that she is buying new shoes and their color is black, this indicates that she will get a job in her future. As if the shoes that the girl saw in her dream were wide, this is a sign of her failure to appreciate things. In addition to Therefore, if an unmarried woman sees high-heeled shoes in her dream, this indicates the fulfillment of her hopes and goals. This also shows her recent journey, after her marriage to a person who has a high status in his society. Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing new shoes in a dream See also: Meanings of dream interpretation for a gift Shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. title: The most important interpretations of seeing a gold store in a dream

preview.html: A gold store in a dream. Seeing a piece of gold in a dream is one of the things that makes many people feel joy and happiness, but many interpretive scholars believe that seeing a piece of gold in a dream has great meaning and value in the life of the dreamer. We will explain the most important indicators and interpretations through our article in the following lines. A gold store in a dream. Many important interpreters have said that seeing a piece of gold in a dream is a sign of many blessings and gifts that will fill the dreamer’s life and change it for the better. Seeing a gold store in a dream means that the dreamer He lives his life in a state of comfort and tranquility and does not suffer from many of the pressures and problems that affected his life and future before. Seeing a gold shop during the dreamer’s sleep means that he is a worthy person who bears many responsibilities and the heavy burdens of life because he is a person he depends on in many matters. Seeing a gold shop Gold in a dream indicates a calm life without debts or financial crises that will put the dreamer in a bad psychological state in the coming periods. The gold store in Ibn Sirin’s dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a gold store in a dream indicates that the dreamer is approaching the date of her engagement to a good young man who has a lot of money. Of good qualities and morals and she will live her life with him in any case. Of love and stability in the coming periods. The great scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing the place of gold during a person’s sleep is an indication that he will achieve many great successes in the coming periods. However, if the dreamer sees the place of gold in his dream, this means that he will obtain it. An important position and position in the country in the coming periods. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. A gold store in a dream for a single woman. Many prominent jurists in interpretation have confirmed that seeing a woman An unmarried woman entering a place of gold in her dream indicates that she was able to achieve many desires and desires that she had hoped for for a long time. Seeing a place of gold during a girl’s sleep indicates that she will enjoy success in everything, whether in her work or in her personal life, and that she will receive many Happy events that will make her feel great joy and happiness next time. Menstruation. Many prominent interpretation scholars also said that seeing a gold store in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates entering into an emotional relationship with a wealthy young man with whom she will achieve many great goals and successes. A gold store in a dream for a married woman. Many prominent interpretation scholars have confirmed that seeing a gold store In a dream for a married woman, it means that she is living her married life without problems or pressures that affect her relationship with her husband during this period. Meanwhile, if a woman sees in her dream that she is entering gold, this is an indication that she has many good qualities that always make her life partner feel comfortable and stable with him. Many prominent experts in interpretation said that the vision of Q

title: Learn about the 25 most accurate interpretations of seeing a net in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a golden net in a dream and its meaning. The net in a dream has many different interpretations for seeing it in a dream, and the interpretation varies from one person to another and from one vision to another, as well as from one man to another. At the wedding, which the groom must bring according to certain specifications. Online dream interpretations. Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin believes that losing the network in a dream is a bad vision that indicates the loss of position and job. Ibn Sirin also sees the vision of losing the network as evidence of instability and tension in the relationship between the fortuneteller and a partner. His life. As for the person who sees in his dream that the network is broken, this vision is good news for the dreamer that he has gotten rid of an evil that would have happened to him in his life. Seeing the network in a dream means that the dreamer will be exposed to a conspiracy during the next period of his life. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi sees a person in a dream that Acquires a large amount of net, this vision is evidence that the dreamer will receive very good nutrition and abundance during the coming days of his life. Dreaming of a person in a dream who finds or acquires an ingot of gold indicates that the dreamer will experience a period of his life full of sorrows, worries, and crises. If someone saw in a dream that the net was a ring made of gold only, this was good news for the dreamer following an extensive diet. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing the net in a dream indicates that the dreamer will earn halal profits. The net in a traveler’s dream is a vision that heralds the dreamer’s return from Traveling and getting rid of his crises and problems. But if someone sees an iron grate in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer will get a lot of sustenance and something very good in the coming days. A grate in a dream for single people. Seeing a grate in an unmarried girl’s dream means that the dreamer will hear good news in the coming days. Coming up. If an unmarried girl sees the net in her dream, this means that the girl will get engaged soon or that the date of marriage is approaching. While an unmarried girl dreams that her net falls to the ground and breaks, this indicates that there are disagreements between her and her fiancé, which will result in separation and annulment. Engagement. If a girl sees in a dream that she goes to a gold store and buys a net, this is good news for her that she will get married soon. When an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is wearing a silver net, this indicates a new job opportunity that the girl will get in the coming days. In general The net in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates abundance of sustenance. Interpretation of the dream of the golden net by Ibn Sirin. A girl’s dream of turning the silver net into gold is a vision indicating that her situation will change for the better. A person who sees in a dream a net of pure gold is a sign of true feelings, honesty and loyalty. However, if he sees in the dream the net mixed with things other than gold, and it appears as if he is deceived, then this indicates hypocrisy, deception, and lying. Losing the net in a dream is a vision that does not bode well and indicates that the dreamer will lose someone close to him. Wearing a fishing net in a dream is a good vision that indicates Increased goodness, abundance of food, and blessings

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a recommendation in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a recommendation in a dream, and this dream differs in its interpretations, according to those details that were mentioned in the dream, as the dream is, by nature, a series of fantasies during sleep, and the interpretation of these dreams varies from one person to another, and many scholars and experts in dream interpretation who They explained the consequences of these dreams that we see in a dream, and in this article we present to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing a recommendation in a dream and its effects.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a recommendation in a dream, as this dream included many interpretations and interpretations that differ based on the details contained in the dream, and in this context we explain to you the interpretation of a dream Seeing a recommendation in a dream and its effects consist of the following: Seeing a recommendation in a dream is evidence that the dreamer cares about those around him. It also works for their comfort and provides them with security and stability. In addition, dreaming of introducing a specific person into the dream. It is an indication that the dreamer cares about this person. And he is also afraid of risks in life. Seeing a recommendation about a specific thing in a dream as well. It is evidence that the dreamer is oppressed and persecuted by those close to him. Likewise, if a father’s recommendation to his children appears in a dream. This dream is evidence of his extreme anxiety and fear of them, as it appears His love for them. See also: Interpretation of the dream of angels in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of the will of the living for the living. The dream of will is one of those dreams that are repeated in the dreams of many individuals, but they differ in their details, and therefore they differ in their interpretations, and along these lines we will get to know them. Interpretation of the dream of will Neighborhood to neighborhood Also: The neighborhood’s recommendation to the neighborhood is evidence of his concern for his family members, friends, and neighbors. It also indicates that he wants to provide comfort and security for these people, and God is Most High and knows that. See also: Evidence for the interpretation of a dream of hearing or reading the Qur’an in a dream. I dreamed of introducing my daughter, which is one of the dreams Which can make many women feel anxious and want to know the interpretations for them, and in this context we explain to you the interpretation. I dreamed of introducing my daughter also: In the event that the woman sees that she is introducing someone to her daughter. This dream indicates that the woman is worried about her daughter. In addition, This dream is a sign of fear for the daughter’s future. In addition, this dream could be an indication that the dreamer is facing many problems, whether at work or with the family, and this makes him worried and afraid for his daughter. It could also be a sign of the love of the visionary. And his concern for his daughter and that he is thinking about those ways that help secure her future. See also: Interpretation of dreams I dreamed that my mother was giving me money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the dead recommends living in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a dead person in a dream is one of the visions that worries many people, especially if it is It presents a living person, and here we review it. The interpretation of a dream about the dead about living in a dream is recommended by Ibn Sirin. He also says: Seeing the dead advises the living in a dream. Ibn Sirin also said that a will in a dream is as if the dreamer made a will for the dead, as this indicates piety.

title: Interpretation of seeing dogs running after me in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of seeing dogs running after me in a dream, as it is one of the dreams that people see constantly, and although dogs in ordinary life represent the loyal friend of many people, many people become afraid and panic as soon as they see dogs, whether in reality or in a dream. For some, seeing dogs in a dream represents one of the worst nightmares they can suffer from. But what do commentators think about seeing dogs in a dream? So our article today revolves around the interpretation of seeing dogs chasing me in a dream, and is this vision praiseworthy or not, and the color of dogs? It changes the interpretation of something, or perhaps the colors and sizes have no meaning. All of this and more detail in the encyclopedia through an article on the interpretation of hunting dogs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing dogs running after me in a dream. Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream in general. Scientists differed among themselves in the interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream. Symbol of women. As for the dogs that run after the dreamer in a dream, they indicate the sins committed by the dreamer or indicate the presence of many enemies who hate the dreamer, envy him, and try to harm him. But if the dreamer sees himself injured in the dream, and there is a dog trying to attack him, this is evidence of... That the dreamer has a good heart and does not bear hatred for anyone, but there is a group of people around him who hate him and try hard to harm him. However, if the dreamer runs away from the dogs in his dream, but they are still running after him, this indicates the presence of a group of evil people who distract the viewer and his status, but His escape from them means his victory and death. Peace crisis. Interpretation of seeing dogs chasing me in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing dogs in general running after God in a dream is evidence of the presence of a fierce enemy who was trying to undermine God with all his might. And if the dreamer sees that there is a group of dogs chasing him and trying to take him down, this is evidence of many problems. Which the dreamer will face and try to bypass. If dogs are chasing you and suddenly you do not see them and they disappear from your eyes, this indicates that the dreamer’s family will face some problems, but they will end soon. But if the dog in the dream has the form of a guard guarding its owner, this indicates the presence of a friend close to him. The viewer is trying to protect him all the time. Interpretation of seeing dogs running after me in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi sees that dogs in general in a dream are an enemy trying to reach the fortune-teller and harm him, and dogs that chase the fortune-teller in a dream are a sign of the injustice that befalls the fortune-teller and an unjust enemy that lurks around him and is constantly creating. A lot of problems around him. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that the dog he owns has bitten him, this means that the dreamer will suffer from a fatal disease or a financial crisis. Eating dog meat in a dream or raising itIf one sees that he is raising dogs in his dream, this means that it is a sign On his success, excellence, and great promotion in his work, and an indication of the dreamer’s high status and abundant financial gains. However, if the fortuneteller sees in a dream that he is eating dog meat, this is evidence of the presence of a close friend of the fortuneteller, but he does not
